description: This seminar is designed specifically for financial services professionals who are looking for ideas that can help grow their business. It is a collection of some of the most effective business building strategies in the industry. Each idea is simplified and presented in a format that lets the student quickly move through the course and focus on ideas that make sense for the participant. The material is broken into four distinct sections that make the seminar easy to focus what make sense for each students business growth objectives. Today's volatile markets present a great opportunity for financial advisors to grow their business and this seminar provides a great opportunity to explore what is working in the field today.
title: Business Building Strategies For Financial Professionals
